roleset.name: onslaught

role.descr: thing actually moving aggressively towards arg2 (ie bullets, words. Non-agentive)

example.name: another arg 1
example.text: A barrage of headline negatives in recent weeks

example.name: first arg 0
example.text: a barrage by the US Navy

example.name: ARG1
example.text: That it is very difficult to discern whether or not that is , in point of fact , the missiles that we have become accustomed to striking Baghdad and its environs , or whether it is the large 2,000 pound JDAM bombs that have been striking targets selected by the coalition in Baghdad , or whether these flashes now represent artillery barrages as fighting continues to take control of the -- to take control of Saddam International Airport .

roleset.note: BARRAGE-N NOTES: Based on ontonotes nouns. Comparison to onsaught.01 and bombard.01.. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie. (from barrage.01-n)
